Introduction
This topic contains information on initial processing of claims by children of Veterans, including
considering a child’s entitlement to DIC
, and
determining a child’s entitlement to DIC
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Common Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Processing Issues
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
